languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, команда авгуров засекла флотилию прямо по курсу — сигнатура двигателей вражеского флагмана совпадает с "Бессердечным". Корабли эскорта облепили его, как мухи гроксово дерь... Кхм, какие будут распоряжения?"

"Lord Cap'n, the augur crew has spotted a fleet dead ahead. The drive signature of the enemy flagship matches that of the Heartless. The escort ships are sticking to it like flies to groxshi— Anyway, what are your orders?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, команда авгуров засекла флотилию прямо по курсу — сигнатура двигателей вражеского флагмана совпадает с "Бессердечным". Корабли эскорта облепили его, как мухи гроксово дерь... Кхм, какие будут распоряжения?"

"Lord Cap'n, the augur crew has spotted a fleet dead ahead. The drive signature of the enemy flagship matches that of the Heartless. The escort ships are sticking to it like flies to groxshi— Anyway, what are your orders?"

languages.text: «Lord Capi, los augures han detectado una flota justo delante. La señal de los motores de su nave insignia coincide con la de la Desalmada. Las naves de escolta la rodean como moscas a la mie... Perdón, ¿cuáles son sus órdenes?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augur crew has spotted a fleet dead ahead. The drive signature of the enemy flagship matches that of the Heartless. The escort ships are sticking to it like flies to groxshi— Anyway, what are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capi, los augures han detectado una flota justo delante. La señal de los motores de su nave insignia coincide con la de la Desalmada. Las naves de escolta la rodean como moscas a la mie... Perdón, ¿cuáles son sus órdenes?».

languages.text: “船长老大，俄歇矩阵班组发现了前方的舰队。敌方旗舰的引擎特征与无心号相匹配。周围到处都是护卫舰，就像一群嗡嗡乱飞的苍蝇围着格洛克斯兽的屎一样。总之，你打算怎么整？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augur crew has spotted a fleet dead ahead. The drive signature of the enemy flagship matches that of the Heartless. The escort ships are sticking to it like flies to groxshi— Anyway, what are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: “船长老大，俄歇矩阵班组发现了前方的舰队。敌方旗舰的引擎特征与无心号相匹配。周围到处都是护卫舰，就像一群嗡嗡乱飞的苍蝇围着格洛克斯兽的屎一样。总之，你打算怎么整？”

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, l'équipe des augures a repéré une flotte droit devant. La signature du réacteur du vaisseau amiral adverse correspond à celle du Sans-Cœur. Son escorte lui colle au train comme une nuée de mouches autour d'une fiente de grox... Bref, quels sont vos ordres ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augur crew has spotted a fleet dead ahead. The drive signature of the enemy flagship matches that of the Heartless. The escort ships are sticking to it like flies to groxshi— Anyway, what are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-cap'taine|Seigneure-cap'taine}, l'équipe des augures a repéré une flotte droit devant. La signature du réacteur du vaisseau amiral adverse correspond à celle du Sans-Cœur. Son escorte lui colle au train comme une nuée de mouches autour d'une fiente de grox... Bref, quels sont vos ordres ? »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、スキャナー・クルーが船の真正面に標的を定めました。敵の旗艦の信号は、ハートレスの信号と一致しています。護衛艦は、蜥蜴牛にまとわりつく蝿のようにくっついています。何はともあれ、どうします？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augur crew has spotted a fleet dead ahead. The drive signature of the enemy flagship matches that of the Heartless. The escort ships are sticking to it like flies to groxshi— Anyway, what are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、スキャナー・クルーが船の真正面に標的を定めました。敵の旗艦の信号は、ハートレスの信号と一致しています。護衛艦は、蜥蜴牛にまとわりつく蝿のようにくっついています。何はともあれ、どうします？」

languages.text: "Alamet mürettebatı, tam önümüzde bir filo olduğunu tespit etti Lord Kaptan. Düşman amiral gemisinin sürüş imzası, Taşkalp'inki ile eşleşiyor. Refakatçi gemiler de dibinde. Sinekten farksızlar, groks bo... Emirleriniz nedir?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augur crew has spotted a fleet dead ahead. The drive signature of the enemy flagship matches that of the Heartless. The escort ships are sticking to it like flies to groxshi— Anyway, what are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: "Alamet mürettebatı, tam önümüzde bir filo olduğunu tespit etti Lord Kaptan. Düşman amiral gemisinin sürüş imzası, Taşkalp'inki ile eşleşiyor. Refakatçi gemiler de dibinde. Sinekten farksızlar, groks bo... Emirleriniz nedir?"

languages.text: "Lord Cap'n, die Augurencrew hat eine feindliche Flotte auf zwölf Uhr geortet. Laut Triebwerkssignatur ist das feindliche Flaggschiff die Heartless. Die Geleitschiffe kleben an ihr wie Fliegen an Groxschei... egal, wie lauten Eure Befehle?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Cap'n, the augur crew has spotted a fleet dead ahead. The drive signature of the enemy flagship matches that of the Heartless. The escort ships are sticking to it like flies to groxshi— Anyway, what are your orders?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Cap'n, die Augurencrew hat eine feindliche Flotte auf zwölf Uhr geortet. Laut Triebwerkssignatur ist das feindliche Flaggschiff die Heartless. Die Geleitschiffe kleben an ihr wie Fliegen an Groxschei... egal, wie lauten Eure Befehle?"
